events.name: Structure of the Electric Vehicle Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_label: Structure of the Electric Vehicle Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: Understanding the supply chain can help businesses and governments understand how trade flows and resources will be affected by increased demand for EVs and thus, their inputs.
events.description: Understanding the supply chain can help businesses and governments understand how trade flows and resources will be affected by increased demand for EVs and thus, their inputs.

events.name: China as a supplier of lithium-ion battery cells
events.wd_label: China as a supplier of lithium-ion battery cells
events.wd_description: China and the United States appear to be the largest suppliers of lithium-ion battery cells in the future.

events.name: Resource Allocation
events.wd_description: The rising demand for lithium-ion batteries will drive significant shifts in resource allocation, impacting material sourcing and production strategies.
events.description: The rising demand for lithium-ion batteries will drive significant shifts in resource allocation, impacting material sourcing and production strategies.

events.name: Material Sourcing
events.wd_description: Increased demand for lithium, cobalt, and other materials essential for lithium-ion battery production will influence global sourcing strategies.
events.description: Increased demand for lithium, cobalt, and other materials essential for lithium-ion battery production will influence global sourcing strategies.

events.name: Production Strategies
events.wd_description: Manufacturers will adapt their production strategies to meet the growing demand for lithium-ion batteries, focusing on efficiency and scalability.
events.description: Manufacturers will adapt their production strategies to meet the growing demand for lithium-ion batteries, focusing on efficiency and scalability.
